Class LocalContentPublisher

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.tzima.partialsshot.publishing.local.LocalContentPublisher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContentPublisher
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DropboxContentPublisher

    public class LocalContentPublisher
extends java.lang.Object
implements ContentPublisher
    Publishes into the local filesystem's directory.
    Author:
    Tomas Zima

      • generateName

        protected static java.lang.String generateName(java.io.File targetDirectory)
        Generates name of the file using the current date and time. In the case such file already exists, name will be modified until a free filename is found.
        Parameters:
        targetDirectory - Local directory to which screenshots are stored.
        Returns:
        A name of the file.
